body_html:
@seanprime7, thanks for reporting this error. We've disabled FBGEMM by default in #14048 until we get to the bottom of the issue. We have a PR that I think should fix this (#14012) but unfortunately, it's not easy to find a machine without avx these days so it's hard to test. I was wondering if you can check by patching the PR this issue will be fixed (please make sure to build with fbgemm option on).

@jspark1105, sure, I will try it out and let you know.

> 
> 
> @seanprime7, thanks for reporting this error. We've disabled FBGEMM by default in #14048 until we get to the bottom of the issue. We have a PR that I think should fix this (#14012) but unfortunately, it's not easy to find a machine without avx these days so it's hard to test.
